definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Buda put a bamboo into a golden gourd and give it to little hat.
sentences.chinese: 佛祖把竹管插入金葫芦，送给勇敢的小卜冒。

sentences.english: The natural gas was carried via bamboo pipes to where it was needed.
sentences.chinese: 天然气通过竹管运输到需要之处。

sentences.english: With a bamboo pipe he could imitate the cries of various kinds of wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 他会用竹管来模仿各种野兽的叫声。

definition: Guanzi or Guan Zhong 管仲 (-645 BC), famous politician of Qi 齊國|齐国 of Spring and Autumn period/Guanzi, classical book containing writings of Guan Zhong and his school
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)
to seal jars etc with mud, clay or lute/lute/luting
